__e: Last night somebody saw a car that looks just like yours leaving Neil's house.
Even your life is like this. It appears like life..
I met a team, much like the one I work with, only you were the leader.
I'm sure the sheriff hasn't forgotten that night much like this one when he could've died if not of my intervention.
Oh, Larry, when I'm boss, you can finally quit dancing, and I'll buy you a car similar to the one you want that I can get through a business connection.
Who else has an idea like this man's Coke machine?
All right, just because this Rebecca is going through something similar to us does not mean that it is happening to us, okay?
What you do, friend, is nothing like what I do.
My world is similar to yours in many ways but very different in others.
A penniless man has no use for morals in this world.
I will call upon a visitor to our nation, a young man who has come from afar to tell us that our predicament is not unique, that once upon a time there was another world, very much like our own,
